segments.text: John , could you come to my office ? I need to talk to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'll be there as soon as I finish this document .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to say that we have to let you go , John .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you're working very hard but not efficiently.And you don't work well with other employees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , some of those other guys are not the same kind I'd like to communicate with , but if that's important to you . I'll try to get along with them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid it's too late . We are downsizing our workforce and you'll have to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can give you the option of residing rather than being fired , because it will look better on your resume when you apply for another job if you resign .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I need to think about that for a while .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , but let me know your decision before the end of the day .
segments.speaker: S2
